name: Anchor with justification
summary: Make a strong proposal (or counter) as a justified anchor tied to objective criteria, then invite their constraints with a calibrated question.
goal: Shift the bargaining range in your favour while staying credible and relationship-safe.
counterparty_guidance: Acknowledge the anchor without accepting the frame; ask for the basis.
Introduce your own benchmark or counter-anchor tied to your objectives.
If the anchor is plausible, trade for a concession before agreeing.
If the anchor is extreme, reframe criteria and narrow the range.

ui.card_summary: Set a defensible reference point with objective criteria.

online_reference.title: Using the Anchoring Heuristic to Make Impactful First Offers (PON)
